document_data.name: The Six Shields
document_data.mainbody: '''The Six Shields''' was an inn in the town of [[Llorkh]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.History: It opened some time after the [[Zhentarim]] takeover of Llorkh in [[1357 DR]], less than a month after [[Worried Wyvern (Llorkh)|the only inn]] in town burned down after [[Phintarn's brother|its owner]] died. Townsfolk were pressed into the construction of two new but ugly inns. The Six Shields was in business by [[1366 DR]] and through [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Description: A three-story inn resembling a barn, it was frequented by soldiers of the [[Lord's Men]] and the [[Zhentilar]], roughnecks who often tracked in mud and sharpened their swords at their tables and filled the air with pipe-smoke. It was little more than a Zhent barracks.
